text:
Hi guys, I think I need help with something,

 I need to use an external library for a very specific case in workflows, is there a way to add another library to the existing ones? or any alternative for this case that you know of? Thanks!
I need to be able to manipulate data in XML format and since I cannot use DOMParser, an alternative that I saw is <https://www.npmjs.com/package/jsdom>
I don't think this is possible
Hopefully someone else has better news for you.  The documentation only says what support libraries are available for node.js and python
Yes, I saw the same thing but maybe there could be an alternative I hope

Hey Marcelo, try to have a look at this article to add npm packages in your custom coded workflow.

<https://developers.HubSpot.com/blog/how-to-use-npm-packages-in-custom-code-workflow-actions>
Interesting!  Essentially you need to compile it and then add build to your  custom coded action.  Thanks for sharing!

Hey guys, I have a small doubt if this is possible on HubSpot or not. I have Twilio number which automatically sends a SMS when a HubSpot deal is created to the contacts involved in the deal. Now can I integrate that Twilio account in HubSpot such that I can continue further conversation from HubSpot itself in the SMS?
Hello Guys! Is there someone that has worked with custom workflow actions and can help me with this? More details in  :thread:
